name: toasty wheat stitch™ crochet sweater
notes:

**[get this in the cozy wheat collection!][1]**
https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/cozy-wheat-crochet-collection#

the **toasty wheat stitch™ crochet sweater** is a must-have addition to your fall wardrobe! crafted with a stunning texture and luxurious drape, this cozy design is perfect for all body types, ensuring everyone can enjoy its warmth and style. this sweater is crocheted cuff-to-cuff, so it only needs two seams to finish. the delicate puff stitches add delightful texture to the sweater, enhancing its visual appeal without overwhelming the overall design.


this sweater pattern comes with a [video tutorial][2].


**crochet hook:**
[h (5.0mm) - or size to meet gauge][3]


**notions:**
[removable stitch markers][4]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][5]
[scissors][6]


**yarn:**
[lion brand color theory][7]
100% acrylic, 246yds/100g
colorway shown: bone
weight: 4 worsted


**yarn substitutes:**
[brava worsted][8] - 100% premium acrylic, 218yds/100g


[mighty stitch][9] - 80% acrylic/20% superwash wool 208yds/100g


[swish worsted][10] - 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g


[heatherly sport][11] - 80% acrylic, 20% merino wool, 328yds/100g


**yardage:**
1150 (1190, 1250, 1400, 1500) (1700, 1900, 2150, 2375) yds
6 (6, 6, 7, 7) (8, 9, 10, 11) balls


**abbreviations:**
ch - chain
blo - back loop only
flo - front loop only
hdc - half double crochet
hdc2tog - half double crochet two together
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
sk - skip
sl st - slip stitch
st(s) - stitch(es)
ws - wrong side


**gauge:**
17 sts and 11 rows = 4" by 4" in established stitch pattern, blocked


not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][12]


**sizes:**
xs (s, m, l, 1x) (2x, 3x, 4x, 5x)
to fit chest: 32 (34, 38, 42, 46) (50, 54, 58, 62)
actual measurements are in schematic.


this garment is meant to be worn with a 3-5 inch positive ease.


**skill level:**
advanced beginner
